24namespace cydui::components {
25 struct component_state_t {
26 window::CWindow* win;
27
28 std::optional<component_state_t*> parent = std::nullopt;
29 std::unordered_map<std::string, component_state_t*> children_states {};
30
31 bool _dirty = false;
32
33 bool focused = false;
34 bool hovering = false;
35
36 std::optional<component_base_t*> component_instance = std::nullopt;
37
50 void mark_dirty() {
51 _dirty = true;
52 }
53
54 template<cydui::events::EventType T>
55 void emit(typename T::DataType ev) {
56 if (nullptr == this->win) return;
57 ev.win = get_id(this->win->win_ref);
58 cydui::events::emit<T>(ev);
59 }
60
69 void force_redraw() {
70 emit<RedrawEvent>({.component = this});
71 }
72 };
73
74 struct component_base_t {
75 std::optional<component_state_t*> state = std::nullopt;
76 std::optional<component_base_t*> parent = std::nullopt;
77 std::vector<component_base_t*> children {};
78
79 std::vector<cydui::events::listener_t*> subscribed_listeners {};
80
81 virtual ~component_base_t() {
82 clear_subscribed_listeners();
83 if (state.has_value()) {
84 state.value()->component_instance = std::nullopt;
85 }
86 }
87 virtual void configure_event_handler() = 0;
88 virtual void subscribe_events() = 0;
89 virtual void clear_children() = 0;
90
91 virtual event_handler_t* event_handler() = 0;
92
93 virtual void redraw(cydui::layout::Layout* layout) = 0;
94 virtual void
95 get_fragment(cydui::layout::Layout* layout, cydui::compositing::compositing_node_t* compositing_node) = 0;
96
97 virtual component_state_t* create_state_instance() = 0;
98
99 virtual component_base_t* find_by_coords(int x, int y) = 0;
100
101 virtual component_dimensional_relations_t get_dimensional_relations() = 0;
102
103 protected:
104 void add_event_listeners(const std::unordered_map<std::string, event_handler_t::listener_data_t> &listeners) {
105 for (auto &l: listeners) {
106 auto &[ev_type, handler] = l;
107 subscribed_listeners.push_back(cydui::events::on_event_raw(ev_type, handler.handler));
108 }
109 }
110 void clear_subscribed_listeners() {
111 for (auto &item: subscribed_listeners) {
112 item->remove();
113 delete item;
114 }
115 subscribed_listeners.clear();
116 }
117 };
118
119 template<ComponentEventHandlerConcept EVH, typename T>
120 struct component_t:
121 public component_base_t,
122 attrs_component<T> {
123 private:
124 cydui::dimensions::dimension_t cx;
125 cydui::dimensions::dimension_t cy;
126 cydui::dimensions::dimension_t cw;
127 cydui::dimensions::dimension_t ch;
128 private:
129 lazy_alloc<EVH> event_handler_ {};
130
131 public:
132 ~component_t() override {
133 clear_subscribed_listeners();
134 if (state.has_value()) {
135 state.value()->component_instance = std::nullopt;
136 }
137 };
138
139 void configure_event_handler() override {
140 if (parent.has_value()) {
141 event_handler_->parent = parent.value()->event_handler();
142 } else {
143 event_handler_->parent = nullptr;
144 }
145 EVH* evh = event_handler_.operator->();
146 evh->state = (typename T::state_t*) state.value();
147 evh->props = &(((T*) this)->props);
148 evh->attrs = (attrs_component<T>*) this;
149 evh->get_dim = [this] {return get_dimensional_relations();};
150 }
151 void subscribe_events() override {
152 clear_subscribed_listeners();
153 EVH* evh = event_handler_.operator->();
154 add_event_listeners(evh->get_event_listeners());
155 }
156 void clear_children() override {
157 for (auto &child: children) {
158 delete child;
159 }
160 children.clear();
161 }
162
163 component_state_t* create_state_instance() override {
164 return new typename T::state_t;
165 }
166 event_handler_t* event_handler() override {
167 return event_handler_;
168 }
169
170 void redraw(cydui::layout::Layout* layout) override {
171 std::vector<component_holder_t> new_children = this->_content();
172 std::vector<component_holder_t> redraw_children = event_handler_->on_redraw();
173 for (auto &item: redraw_children) {
174 new_children.push_back(item);
175 }
176
177 std::size_t id_i = 0;
178 for (auto &item: new_children) {
179 for (auto &component_pair: item.get_components()) {
180 auto [id_, component] = component_pair;
181 std::string id = id_;
182 id.append(":");
183 id.append(std::to_string(id_i));
184
185 // Get or Create state for component
186 component_state_t* child_state;
187 if (state.value()->children_states.contains(id)) {
188 child_state = state.value()->children_states[id];
189 } else {
190 child_state = component->create_state_instance();
191 state.value()->children_states[id] = child_state;
192 }
193
194 // Set child's variables
195 component->state = child_state;
196 child_state->win = state.value()->win;
197 child_state->parent = state.value();
198 child_state->component_instance = component;
199 component->parent = this;
200 children.push_back(component);
201
202 // Configure event handler
203 component->configure_event_handler();
204
205 // Subscribe child events
206 component->subscribe_events();
207 // Redraw child
208 component->redraw(layout);
209
210 }
211 ++id_i;
212 }
213 }
214
215 void
216 get_fragment(cydui::layout::Layout* layout, cydui::compositing::compositing_node_t* compositing_node) override {
217 for (auto &child: children) {
218 auto* child_node = new cydui::compositing::compositing_node_t;
219 compositing_node->children.push_back(child_node);
220 child->get_fragment(layout, child_node);
221 }
222
223 compositing_node->id = (unsigned long) (this->state.value());
224 compositing_node->op = {
225 .x = this->_x.val(),
226 .y = this->_y.val(),
227 .orig_x = this->_margin_left.val() + this->_padding_left.val(),
228 .orig_y = this->_margin_top.val() + this->_padding_top.val(),
229 .w = this->_w.val(),
230 .h = this->_h.val(),
231 .rot = 0.0, // dim->rot.val(),
232 .scale_x = 1.0, // dim->scale_x.val(),
233 .scale_y = 1.0, // dim->scale_y.val(),
234 };
235
236 auto &fragment = compositing_node->graphics;
237 fragment.clear();
238 event_handler_->draw_fragment(fragment);
239 if (!fragment.empty()) {
240 for (const auto &elem: fragment.elements) {
241 auto fp = elem->get_footprint();
242 if (fp.x + fp.w > compositing_node->op.w) {
243 compositing_node->op.w = fp.x + fp.w;
244 }
245 if (fp.y + fp.h > compositing_node->op.h) {
246 compositing_node->op.h = fp.y + fp.h;
247 }
248 }
249 }
250 }
251
252 component_base_t* find_by_coords(int x, int y) override {
253 component_base_t* found = nullptr;
254 for (auto c = children.rbegin(); c != children.rend(); ++c) {
255 found = (*c)->find_by_coords(x, y);
256 if (nullptr != found) {
257 return found;
258 }
259 }
260 if (cx.val() <= x && x < cx.val() + cw.val()) {
261 if (cy.val() <= y && y < cy.val() + ch.val()) {
262 return this;
263 }
264 }
265 return nullptr;
266 }
267
268 component_dimensional_relations_t get_dimensional_relations() override {
269 return {
270 this->_x,
271 this->_y,
272 this->_w,
273 this->_h,
274 this->_w_has_changed,
275 this->_h_has_changed,
276 this->cx,
277 this->cy,
278 this->cw,
279 this->ch,
280 this->_margin_top,
281 this->_margin_bottom,
282 this->_margin_left,
283 this->_margin_right,
284 this->_padding_top,
285 this->_padding_bottom,
286 this->_padding_left,
287 this->_padding_right,
288 };
289 }
290 };
291}
